app.validators package¶

Submodules¶

app.validators.collection_summary_validator module¶

The module defines validator for a collection summary.

app.validators.collection_summary_validator.collection_summary_validate(collection_summary: str)[source]¶

Returns None if the summary doen’t contain any symbols.

app.validators.document_summary_validator module¶

The module defines validator for a document summary.

app.validators.document_summary_validator.document_summary_validate(document_summary: str)[source]¶

Returns None if the summary doen’t contain any symbols.

app.validators.tag_value_validator module¶

The module defines validator for a tag value.

app.validators.tag_value_validator.tag_value_validate(tag_value: str)[source]¶

Converts all letters to lower case.

app.validators.user_password_validator module¶

The module defines validator for user password.

app.validators.user_password_validator.user_password_validate(user_password: str)[source]¶

The password must meet specific security requirements: it must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character.

app.validators.user_summary_validator module¶

The module defines validator for user summary.

app.validators.user_summary_validator.user_summary_validate(user_summary: str)[source]¶

Returns None if the summary doen’t contain any symbols.

app.validators.user_totp_validator module¶

The module defines validator for one-time password.

app.validators.user_totp_validator.user_totp_validate(user_totp: str)[source]¶

The one-time password must contain only digits.

app.validators.username_validator module¶

The module defines validator for username.

app.validators.username_validator.username_validate(username: str)[source]¶

The username must contain only letters and digits.
